heroTitle: Buy Chicks. Rear Them. Sell Back. Make Profit.
heroSubtitle: We help you start your chicken business without stress. We sell you quality chicks and buy them back when they are big.
step1Desc: Select your birds and quantity on our website. It's very fast.
step2Desc: Pay a small booking fee to secure your spot in the queue.
step3Desc: We confirm your payment within a few minutes.
step4Desc: Our manager will call you within 5 minutes to discuss pick-up.
step5Desc: Go to the nearest agent in your town to collect your chicks.
bookingNote: Allocation is fast. We call you immediately after payment!
sellToUsDesc: Many farmers grow chickens but struggle to find buyers. We solve that problem! We buy mature birds at a very good price for hotels and restaurants.
fairPrices: We pay a very fair price.
fairPriceNotice: Fair Price. Fast Payment. No Stories.
challengesSubtitle: We know the problems, and we have the solutions.
solFeed: We sell high-quality feed that makes birds grow fast.
solSickness: We guide you on how to keep your birds healthy.
solMarket: We buy back your mature birds at a great price.
solTools: We sell the best drinkers and feeders (tools).
solCare: We give you expert advice to avoid losing birds.
afdecPromise: We guide you from Day 1 until you sell your birds!
agentProgramDesc: Anyone can become an AFDEC agent. Help others get chicks and earn money easily.
earnPerChick: Earn ₦50 to ₦100 for every single chick sold!
trustDesc: Your booking fee secures your spot. We confirm fast, call you quickly, and the process is 100% transparent.
footerSlogan: Helping Nigerians earn more through poultry.
importantBusinessNoticeDesc: The booking fee is non-refundable and ensures only serious farmers get allocation.
